data.what_is:
The Zeta Marketing Platform (ZMP) delivers what matters most to your organization--real growth. Powered by an industry leading combination of proprietary data and AI, ZMP enables marketers to create individualized omnichannel experiences that drive acquisition, revenue growth, and retention along with increased marketing efficiency. Recognize your best customers and prospects across channels and devices and deliver the right offer and content at the right time and preferred channel based on unique attributes and unmatched predictive insight.
 
Native CDP and identity resolution
The Zeta Marketing Platform includes a native CDP solution that uses Zeta's expansive identity graph to ID anonymous users and engage them across channels with meaningful, individualized experiences. You can configure your brand's identity resolution, unification and hygiene requirements with an intuitive, low-code visual interface. Zeta's solution is rooted in the strength and scale of our deterministic data set (750M+ identities globally), providing a unique depth of customer knowledge.
*   	Achieve a single persistent view of your customers and prospects
*   	Maintain identity with rigorous ID resolution and integrated data hygiene
*   	Integrate any data source with instantaneous access and real-time updates
 
Prospect acquisition at scale
Leverage Zeta's continuously updated demographic, behavioral and intent signals to uncover consumers in market for your products. Only the Zeta Marketing Platform combines a proprietary deterministic data set, industrial-strength identifiers and a complete solution for omnichannel orchestration and activation. Zeta provides the insight you need to ensure your strategy is outcome-driven with measurable performance.
*   	Uncover in-market consumers with deterministic data and intent signals
*   	Execute and coordinate your omnichannel acquisition strategies at scale
*   	Find and engage new customers who look like your best customers
 
Omnichannel engagement
Zeta provides a single platform to orchestrate every customer experience--across channels and throughout an individual's lifecycle. You can activate customer and prospects across thousands of paid and owned channels, optimizing every interaction with up-to-the-minute insights driving to the best possible outcome. Let our powerful AI be your guide to the best decisions. With the Zeta Marketing Platform you can evolve from having an individual strategy for every channel to a holistic customer experience strategy that accounts for how individuals engage your brand in the channels they prefer.
*   	Recognize each individual across channels and devices
*   	Target individuals with enriched customer data and actionable insight
*   	Orchestrate omnichannel messages with 1:1 offers and customized content

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation with Zeta Marketing Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Zeta Marketing Platform is one of the decent and cost-effective marketing automation platforms through we can automate all our marketing campaigns for Mobile, Email, Social media and we can also send push notifications to the customers if they have installed our mobile applications. Its really amazing marketing automation platform for data management, creating and managing end to end marketing campaigns.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
I do not have any dislike for this platform.

Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
Zeta Marketing Platform is less cost-effective and best revenue generator platform, so I will recommend it to other users.

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
After purchasing its license, it has solved lots of problems for automating all our regular marketing campaigns for Mobile, Email, Direct mail, Social media and push notification. Now we are able to do end to end campaign management, data management, API integration for all our real-time campaigns and started sending all our regular campaigns through its scheduler.

Its really amazing marketing automation platform for data management, creating and managing end to end marketing campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: The program is very user-friendly and easy to use
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
This program has many useful additional functions. The program hosts the image to its server, which is a simple active setup process. The program is customizable. The program also allows us to store everything we need in one place. This platform can meet all our email marketing needs.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Support and account management are slow to respond and pay little attention to details. This platform is not expected to use a standard platform. There is a problem with its outdated design, and the format of the email design is sometimes different from the preview format. When there is a load, the program also gets stuck

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
This program provides advanced marketing automation features, such as forms, contact activities, contact management, contact and company insights, advertising management, team messaging, reporting dashboards. This is a global leader in improving and maintaining its competitive advantage.

initial_reviews.review_title: Does the job but lack the finesse to provide a great experience.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
The great thing about Zeta Marketing Platform is the Email Marketing management and control. It offers the ability to build marketing campaigns, set the target audience and scheduling all from a single window. The visual campaign builder is a great feature that is easy to use and make the work highly easy.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
It lacks fluidity and smoothness because of the bugs present. Although they are minor and only come at certain times. It has to up it user experience to take on the bigger player in the market.

Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
The platform provide good opportunity to make use of customer data. It help in making marketing campaigns and email marketing using the data collected. The AI insight isn't that great because of the slightly buggy interface but the campaign creation for email marketing is very good.
The reporting of the active campaigns can be control from the console which is not the best but gets the job done. All in all the platform does what it advertises and that should be the bottom line to justify the usage.

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used it for our customer email marketing management and to send newsletters to people. This enable campaign monitoring and user interaction etc.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: The great thing about Zeta Marketing Platform is the Email Marketing management and control. It offers the ability to build marketing campaigns, set the target audience and scheduling all from a single window. The visual campaign builder is a great feature that is easy to use and make the work highly easy.

review_question_answers.answer: It lacks fluidity and smoothness because of the bugs present. Although they are minor and only come at certain times. It has to up it user experience to take on the bigger player in the market.

The reporting of the active campaigns can be control from the console which is not the best but gets the job done. All in all the platform does what it advertises and that should be the bottom line to justify the usage.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Not a lot if I'm really honest. Nothing works the way it should and it's incredibly expensive even for a standard CRM & email platform.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
The amount of ongoing bugs within this system has gone beyond a joke. There is a clear issue of coding and they seem to not be bothered to address it, but to push you onto the new platform update for more money of course.

To give a specific example of a bug, I added an AB variant on a recurring campaign, it errored and the developers couldn't find out the problem for over a month. I was then told that the issue was the combination of an automated campaign together with an a/b test? Yes, that's right. It's not just this but the support and account management is slow to respond and don't have a level of attention to detail I'd expect from a standard platform (let alone one that costs so much). I'm constantly having to chase for updates, proposals, fixes - NIGHTMARE! Please just don't!

Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
Don't do it! Simple. I really don't give feedback like this usually but I've had such a painful time with them I really wouldn't want anyone to spend money and time with this platform.

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
None, seriously...I cannot think of any!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Not a lot if I'm really honest. Nothing works the way it should and it's incredibly expensive even for a standard CRM & email platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer:
The amount of ongoing bugs within this system has gone beyond a joke. There is a clear issue of coding and they seem to not be bothered to address it, but to push you onto the new platform update for more money of course.

To give a specific example of a bug, I added an AB variant on a recurring campaign, it errored and the developers couldn't find out the problem for over a month. I was then told that the issue was the combination of an automated campaign together with an a/b test? Yes, that's right. It's not just this but the support and account management is slow to respond and don't have a level of attention to detail I'd expect from a standard platform (let alone one that costs so much). I'm constantly having to chase for updates, proposals, fixes - NIGHTMARE! Please just don't!

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
review_question_answers.answer: Don't do it! Simple. I really don't give feedback like this usually but I've had such a painful time with them I really wouldn't want anyone to spend money and time with this platform.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: None, seriously...I cannot think of any!

That i can write a promotion, build the audience, send the promotion, export and more all in one place

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Outdated design that can have issues, email designs sometimes get formatted differently than the preview

Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
Create thorough training guides

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending to our large audience and being able to fatigue one promotion against another. There are a lot of hidden features included in Zeta that allow you to do your promotion all in one place

all_reviews.review_content:

Zeta allows us to store everything we need in one place for all our email marketing needs. From content creation, to list execution.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Zeta can be very slow when loading a lot of different audiences. For creating content objects its hard to tell exactly how the email will be displayed in an email platform.

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Zeta for automated email marketing.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
Not a lot if I'm really honest. Nothing works the way it should and it's incredibly expensive even for a standard CRM & email platform.

What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
The amount of ongoing bugs within this system has gone beyond a joke. There is a clear issue of coding and they seem to not be bothered to address it, but to push you onto the new platform update for more money of course.

To give a specific example of a bug, I added an AB variant on a recurring campaign, it errored and the developers couldn't find out the problem for over a month. I was then told that the issue was the combination of an automated campaign together with an a/b test? Yes, that's right. It's not just this but the support and account management is slow to respond and don't have a level of attention to detail I'd expect from a standard platform (let alone one that costs so much). I'm constantly having to chase for updates, proposals, fixes - NIGHTMARE! Please just don't!

Recommendations to others considering Zeta Marketing Platform:
Don't do it! Simple. I really don't give feedback like this usually but I've had such a painful time with them I really wouldn't want anyone to spend money and time with this platform.

What problems is Zeta Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
None, seriously...I cannot think of any!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Zeta Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Not a lot if I'm really honest. Nothing works the way it should and it's incredibly expensive even for a standard CRM & email platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Zeta Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer:
The amount of ongoing bugs within this system has gone beyond a joke. There is a clear issue of coding and they seem to not be bothered to address it, but to push you onto the new platform update for more money of course.

To give a specific example of a bug, I added an AB variant on a recurring campaign, it errored and the developers couldn't find out the problem for over a month. I was then told that the issue was the combination of an automated campaign together with an a/b test? Yes, that's right. It's not just this but the support and account management is slow to respond and don't have a level of attention to detail I'd expect from a standard platform (let alone one that costs so much). I'm constantly having to chase for updates, proposals, fixes - NIGHTMARE! Please just don't!

review_question_answers.answer: Don't do it! Simple. I really don't give feedback like this usually but I've had such a painful time with them I really wouldn't want anyone to spend money and time with this platform.

review_question_answers.answer: None, seriously...I cannot think of any!
